option.name: PROGRAM_PARAMETERS
option.value: start-dev --metrics-enabled true --health-enabled true --http-port=8080 --cache ispn --features multi-site --cache-remote-host localhost --cache-remote-port 11222 --cache-remote-username keycloak --cache-remote-password Password1! --cache-remote-tls-enabled false --log-level=io.quarkus:info,io.vertx:info,io.netty:info,org.jboss.resteasy:info --db postgres --db-url-host localhost --db-username keycloak --db-password pass --db-url-database keycloakDB --spi-connections-infinispan-quarkus-site-name site1
